trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Frostbite spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, Frostbite spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Frostbitw spider ignores Movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but Poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is Paralyzed while Poisoned in this way.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The ire atronach sheds bright light in a
30-foot radius and dim light to an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the fire atronach moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Firebolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 60ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites.
Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire , the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: Frost atronach make 2 slam attacks.
Frost cloak. Each creature that starts its turns within 5 feet of the frost atronach takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) points of cold damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ice-Breaker
entries: As an action, a frost atronach can smash at the ground, sending ripples of earth and ice around it. All creatures with 5ft. of the atronach must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failure, they take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage and are knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Lightning cloak
entries: Every creature that starts its turn within 5ft. of the storm atronach takes {@dice 2d6} points of lightning damage.

trait.name: Death Explosion
entries: Upon death, storm atronach explodes in a burst of sound. All creatures within 30 ft. must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@dice 8d6}) points of thunder damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Storm atronach makes 2 slam attacks.

action.name: Lightning bolt Storm atronach releases a bolt of
entries: lightning. All creatures in a 100-foot long, 5ft. wide line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@dice 8d6}) points of lightning damage. A successful saving throw halves the damage.

action.name: Chain lightning
entries: Storm atronach chooses 4 creatures with 150ft that it can see. Those creatures must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 35 ({@dice 10d6}) points of lightning damage. A successful saving throw halves the damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If Chaurus moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with its bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the chaurus can make another attack with its bite against it as a bonus

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The chaurus exhales poisonous liquid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If Chaurus moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with its bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the chaurus can make another attack with its bite against it as a bonus

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The chaurus exhales poisonous liquid in a 40-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison shot
entries: The fledgling shoots poison from its mouth at the targeted creature. Ranged weapon attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 30ft., one target. {@h}54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the Chaurus can make another attack with its bite against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The Chaurus shoots poisonos liquid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiatack
entries: Dragon makes 2 attacks: one with its bite, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.
The target then must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Yol-Toor-Shul (Fire Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC l5 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fo-Krah-diin (Frost Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC l5 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target fails its save, its speed is also reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Multiatack
entries: Dragon makes 2 attacks: one with its bite, and one with its tail.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Yol-Toor-Shul (Fire Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fo-Krah-diin (Frost Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC l6 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If it fails the saving throw, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Frost dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite or tail and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fo-Krah-diin (Frost Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throwor take 63 ({@damage 14d8}) cold damage and have its speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. A successful save halves the damage and negates the speed reduction. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the speed reduction on a success.

action.name: Tail sweep
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Fo-Krah-diin (Frost Breath) (Recharge 5-6).
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throwor take 54 ({@damage 12d8}) cold damage and have its speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. A successful save halves the damage and negates the speed reduction.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of
the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Soul of the dov
entries: The ancient dragon has advantage on all saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Adaptation
entries: The dragon can move across and climb any surface without needing to make an ability check.
Additionally, difficult terrain doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence.
It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit 21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. The creatures hit must then make a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

Frightful presence. Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns , ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours .

action.name: Yol-Toor-Shul (Fire Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fo-Krah-diin (Frost Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or take 54 ({@damage 12d8}) cold damage and have its speed reduced by 10 feet for 1 minute. A successful save halves the damage and negates the speed reduction. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the speed reduction on a success.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (costs 2 actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Soul of the dov
entries: Alduin has advantage on all saving throws.

trait.name: Adaptation
entries: Alduin can move across and climb any surface without needing to make an ability check.
Additionally, difficult terrain doesn't cost it extra movement.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Alduin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Alduin can use its Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15ft., one target. Hit 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit 20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. The creatures hit must then make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Alduin's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns , ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Alduin's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Yol-Toor-Shul (Fire Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: Alduin exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 117 ({@damage 26d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fo-Krah-Diin (Frost Breath) {@recharge 5}
entries: Alduin exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take 99 ({@damage 22d8}) cold damage and have its speed reduced by 15 feet for 1 minute. A successful save halves the damage and negates the speed reduction. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the speed reduction on a success.

action.name: Fus-Ro-Dah (Unrelenting Force) {@recharge 5}
entries: Alduin lets out a roar empowered by his own soul, shooting each creature in a 90-foot cone. Each creature caught in the shout must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or take 90 ({@dice 20d8}) points of force damage and be thrown away 90 feet in the direction of the shout, taking an additional 31 ({@dice 9d6}) points of bludgeoning damage upon landing {@condition prone}. A successful saving throw halves the damage and stop the targe from being flung away.

action.name: Meteor Storm (2/Day)
entries: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points Alduin can see within 1 miles. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point chosen must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes {@damage 20d6} fire damage and {@damage 20d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one fiery burst is affected only once.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Alduin makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Alduin makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (costs 2 actions)
entries: Alduin beats its wings. Each creature within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Alduin can then fly up to half its flying speed.

entries: Draugr Scourge adds double its proficiency bonus on Perception checks.

action.name: Ice Spike
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 40ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d12}) cold damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Unrelenting force: Fus-Ro-Dah
entries: All creatures in a 30 foot cone in front of Draugr Scourge must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be flung to the the end of its reach, landing {@condition prone} upon landing. If the creature is Huge or larger, or a dragon, it is not flung, but loses its balance and falls {@condition prone} nevertheless on a failed save.

trait.name: Brutal
entries: Draugr Overlord's weapons deal an additional 5 damage on each successful hit, and it can use Strength instead of Dexterity on ranged attacks. Additionally, Draugr Overlord can use Strength, instead of Charisma, to determine the DC of its Dragon Shouts.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dwarven spider has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Charging Jump
entries: When a dwarven spider is 10 feet away from its target, it can leap towards it as a part of the move action and make a single claw attack. If it hits, multiply the damage by 4.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dwarven spider makes 2 claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. Shock spit. Ranged Spell attack: {@hit 2} to hit, reach 15ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Magic resistance
entries: Dwarven sphere has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mobility
entries: Dwarven spheres do not provoke Opportunity Attacks caused by moving out of their opponent's reach.
Guardian's design. Dwarven sphere's weapons always deal {@dice 3d8} points of damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dwarven sphere makes 3 attacks with its crossbow or arm blade, in any combination.

action.name: Arm Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crossbow
entries: Ranged Spell attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 120/320ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dwarven balista has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Powerful Bolts
entries: Dwarven balistas shoot powerful metal spears that can pierce the most powerful armor. When an armored enemy is struck with a bolt, it receives a -1 penalty to Armor Class until the armor is repaired. If this reduction reduces the Armor Class received from the armor to 0, the armor is destroyed. If an unarmored enemy is hit with a bolt, double the damage from it.

action.name: Balista Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 120/320ft., one target. {@h}49 ({@damage 8d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Magic resistance
entries: Dwarven centurion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and takes only half damage from magical sources.
Legendary resistance (3/day) If the Centurion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Dwarven centurion makes 3 attacks: 2 with its warhammer and 1 with its battleaxe.

action.name: Dwarven Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. The creature must then make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Dwarven Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 3d12 + 8}) slashing damage. The creature must then make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Centurion exhales scalding steam in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being Underwater doesn't grant Resistance against this damage.

trait.name: Blind adaption
entries: The Falmer are completely used to being blind, and receive no penalties for that condition, except automatically failing all Perception checks relying on sight. An {@condition invisible} creature doesn't get advantage on its Stealth checks against the Falmer.

action.name: Falmer Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also Unconscious while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Falmer Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blind adaption
entries: The Falmer are completely used to being blind, and receive no penalties for that condition, except automatically failing all Perception checks relying on sight. An {@condition invisible} creature doesn't get advantage on its Stealth checks against the Falmer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Falmer Skulker makes 2 attacks with its sword, or 2 attacks with its bow.

action.name: Falmer Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also Unconscious while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Falmer Bow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Frostbite
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d12}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 5 feet for 1 round. Falmer Skulker can use its action on subsequent turns to automatically deal this damage and reduce the target's speed. This is a concentration spell that lasts up to 1 minute.

trait.name: Blind adaption
entries: The Falmer are completely used to being blind, and receive no penalties for that condition, except automatically failing all Perception checks relying on sight. An {@condition invisible} creature doesn't get advantage on its Stealth checks against the Falmer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Falmer Nightprowler makes 2 spell attacks: one with an Ice Spike and the other with Frostbite.

action.name: Falmer Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also Unconscious while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Frostbite
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 5 feet for 1 round. Falmer Skulker can use its action on subsequent turns to automatically deal this damage and reduce the target's speed. This is a concentration spell that lasts up to 1 minute.

action.name: Ice Spike
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 40ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) cold damage and 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blind adaption
entries: The Falmer are completely used to being blind, and receive no penalties for that condition, except automatically failing all Perception checks relying on sight. An {@condition invisible} creature doesn't get advantage on its Stealth checks against the Falmer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Falmer Shadowmaster makes 2 attacks with its bound sword and one spell attack.

action.name: Bound Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also Unconscious while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Frostbite
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet for 1 round. Falmer Skulker can use its spell attack on subsequent turns to automatically deal this damage and reduce the target's speed. This is a concentration spell that lasts up to 1 minute.

action.name: Ice Spike
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 40ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) cold damage and 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blind adaption
entries: The Falmer are completely used to being blind, and receive no penalties for that condition, except automatically failing all Perception checks relying on sight. An {@condition invisible} creature doesn't get advantage on its Stealth checks against the Falmer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Falmer Warmonger makes 2 attacks with its bound sword, uses its Frostbite, and shoots an Ice Spike.

action.name: Bound Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be Poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also Unconscious while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

action.name: Frostbite
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 15 feet for 1 round. Falmer Skulker can use its spell attack on subsequent turns to automatically deal this damage and reduce the target's speed. This is a concentration spell that lasts up to 1 minute.

action.name: Ice Spike
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 40ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) cold damage and 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The crab can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Shell Camouflage
entries: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Nature) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The giant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the giant takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The giant dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Winter's Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the giant is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the giant gains the following benefits:
- The giant has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
- When it makes a melee weapon attack, the giant gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.
- The giant has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks with its greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 30 ({@damage 3d12 + 11}) bludgeoning damage while raging.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Spider climb
entries: Frostbite spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, Frostbite spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: Frostbite spider ignores Movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but Poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is Paralyzed while Poisoned in this way.

action.name: Poison Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/30 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 8d8}) damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 round.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The spriggan can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a Language.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on his turn, the spriggan can use 10 ft. of his Movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 ft. of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the second tree. Both trees must be large or bigger.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: When dropped to 5 hit points or fewer but not instantly killed, the spriggan regenerates 52 ({@dice 8d8 + 16}) hit points. This ability can only be used once per day.

action.name: Swarm Of Bees (1/Day)
entries: As an Action, the spriggan can summon a swarm of bees to assist it in combat. For the swarm use the swarm of instects stat block.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Brutal Strikes
entries: The troll adds double its Strength modifier on damage rolls with its claws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes 2 claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The frost troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The frost troll regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the frost troll takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The frost troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Brutal Strikes
entries: The frost troll adds double its Strength modifier on damage rolls with its claws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The frost troll makes 2 claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 23 ({@damage 2d8 + 14}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: While another ally of the wisp is 5ft. within the target, the wisp has advantage on its attack rolls.

action.name: Wisp's Kiss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Wispmother is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (Spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). She knows the following spells:

trait.name: Cold Magic
entries: The Wispmothers Fireball spell becomes Iceball, dealing cold damage instead.

action.name: Open Chin Choke
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2})

action.name: Scorpion Flurry
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2})

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

variant.name: Diseased Giant Rats
entries: Some giant rats carry vile diseases that they spread with their bites.

entries.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The walrus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

action.name: Tusks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

Walruses are bulky marine mammals that favor arctic climates and communicate by grunting and roaring. A typical adult specimen weighs at least 2,000 pounds. Humans hunt them for their meat, fat, skin, bones, and tusks.
